thread.title: World Cup 2018: Gareth Bale, Alexis Sanchez and Arjen Robben among big name stars who could miss out on Russia
thread.title_full: World Cup 2018: Gareth Bale, Alexis Sanchez and Arjen Robben among big name stars who could miss out on Russia

author: arichardson
title: World Cup 2018: Gareth Bale, Alexis Sanchez and Arjen Robben among big name stars who could miss out on Russia
text:
EFL moscow away World Cup 2018: Gareth Bale, Alexis Sanchez and Arjen Robben among big name stars who could miss out on Russia 
With so many more nations eager to reach football's grandest stage, here are nine top players currently not reaching finals By Andrew Richardson Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THE World Cup may be the greatest event in sport — but Russia 2018 looks set to take place without a number of global superstars. 
Players like Henrikh Mkhitaryan were always expected to miss out as it would have taken a miracle for Armenia to qualify. EPA 10 Philipp Lahm lifts the trophy after Germany’s triumph in Brazil in 2014 
Meanwhile, the likes France will have to leave some top stars at home given the unbelievable depth of quality at Didier Deschamps’ disposal. 
Keep up to date with ALL the 2018 World Cup news 
But, with only one European side from each group guaranteed to make the 2018 World Cup — and just five in all from South America — some household names just won’t reach the showpiece. 
As this most recent set of international fixtures comes to a close, we take a look at the stars whose countries are currently outside the qualifying places.
